description: Unique identifier for a saved KPI dashboard configuration.
Identifier of the user who owns or is assigned this configuration; likely a foreign key to the users table.
Human-readable title shown to users for the saved KPI dashboard configuration.
Serialized layout definition (likely JSON) describing widget arrangement, sizes, filters, and settings for the KPI dashboard; confirm exact schema with SME.
Boolean indicating whether this is the default dashboard automatically loaded (user-level or global); confirm scope with SME.
